name: Content Cloud Featured Image
details: This view displayed all the content within your instance of Content Cloud. From here, a user could change content statuses, add items to playlist(s), and upload new content.

name: Content Cloud Dashboard
details: The dashboard provides an at-a-glance view of all your content within Content Cloud: A breakdown of your content by type, available versus pending content, recently-added items, and a user-activity log.

name: Content Cloud Experience
details: A shareable site is automatically created when a user publishes a playlist, displaying all the content in a masonry-grid layout. Each piece of content can then be shared and interacted with. This site can be shared through a contentcloud.com or a self-hosted domain. Additionally, users can sign up to gain access to Content Cloud's APIs to create their own playlist pages and layouts.
